articles.title: Rapper shot dead - just days after claiming to be target of robberies in an interview - Daily Mail
articles.description: Rapper PnB Rock, 30, was fatally shot during a robbery at Roscoe's Chicken & Waffles in Los Angeles on Monday after posting a video on Instagram showing off diamond chains.
articles.content: Rapper PnB Rock posted a video to his Instagram showing off diamond chains just before being shot and killed in a robbery at a chicken eatery in Los Angeles after his girlfriend gave away their locat… [+7264 chars]
